<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/me/mfa"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the user's MFA configuration status.

# Response

- 200 OK: MFA status returned
- 401 Unauthorized: Not authenticated
